heading: Sunday
text: Periods of clouds through the north and mountains, giving way to more afternoon sun. Morning sun mixing with clouds in the Champlain and southern valleys. Continued chilly. Highs ranging through the 40s. Winds northwest 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Sunday Night
text: Mostly clear, fog developing in the valleys after midnight. Lows in the upper 20s northeast to mid 30s southwest.

heading: Monday
text: Some morning sun, then more clouds north, with an increasing chance of showers through New York in the afternoon. Showers are spreading east during the early evening. Milder. Highs in the 50s, near 50 far north.
